subject: From Mrs Kim Tikky Kumalo Please Get Back To Me
body:
Thanks for your email and I am sorry for the late reply because of my poor
health condition.



Compliments of the day to you and with due respect, trust and humility, i
write this letter to you regards to your response towards my request,
please note that I really need your full assistance in this my transaction,
I promise you that you will never regret of helping me in this transaction
because this transaction is 100% legal. I thank God that connected me to
you because I have been looking for a good person that will honestly help
me to achieve my dreams now am still alive and also take good care of my
only son John  who is 15years if I did not survive this illness.. We reside
in Johannesburg City in South Africa and my home address is No.61 Peter
Place Lyme Sandton Johannesburg and the name of the hospital where I am is
Johannesburg central hospital.



Meanwhile after going through your email, I understand that you are more
than willing and sincere to assist me in this my project regardless that we
have not meet each other but, I believe in faith because I’m a Christian,
with faith we can move mountains according to my believe and with your
response, I don't really need a prophet to tell me that you are a good
person, I know you are a God sent.



All I require from you is that you please help me to donate a part of the
money towards some charity organizations because I am in and out of
hospital due to my poor health and the stress of worrying about my son’s
well being after I am no more is weighing very heavily on my shoulder,
Listen to me right now because I want to use this opportunity to instruct
you on how you will use this fund, I will offer you 30% of the principal
sum of the amounts that will be transfer into your account for your
assistance and you will keep 20% out of the fund for my only son John and
the remaining balance of 50% will be build to orphanages, churches,
research centers and widows.



My husband 's brothers are desperate to take over my inheritance because
they know that I am not a South Africa,but a South Korea by birth, they
want me dead because of my inheritance. It will be better I commit suicide
today than watch this happen and they have claim everything my late husband
left for me, the only thing remaining is this money my late husband
deposited on my name and they don't know anything about the deposit
otherwise I would have been dead by now because of this money.




Attached below are  my pictures as well for you to know that I am for real
and please send me your personal information as well for me to use it to
obtain an authorization letter and proceed the transaction with you and for
you to use it to contact the bank manager which i will give you his contact
details on your next email, the banker will help us to obtain all the
necessary document that will back up this transfer so you do not need to
worry about anything regarding this transfer. The information I want you to
provide me is below.



(1) Your full name

(2) Your personal telephone number

(3) your country and occupation

(4) your gender


Finally please promised me that you will carry out my wishes

.

I wait to hear from you



Thank you so much


Mrs. Kim  Kumalo.

My Private Phone:


 +27-784 610 882

subject: Re: From Mrs Kim Tikky Kumalo Please Get Back To Me
body:
Hello Mrs. Kim Kumalo,

I'm really sorry to hear about your health condition and the situation you're currently facing. It must be very tough for you, especially with your son John involved. I hope things get better soon.

Your story is quite touching and it's admirable that despite everything, you still want to help others through charity. That's a noble cause indeed.

However, I'm a bit confused about some parts of your email. Could you please clarify what exactly you need my assistance with? You mentioned something about a fund transfer but I didn't quite understand the details.

Also, could you tell me more about these charities? Are they local in South Africa or international? And how did you come across them?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ramona

subject: Re: From Mrs Kim Tikky Kumalo Please Get Back To Me
body:
Hello Mrs. Kim Kumalo,

I'm really sorry to hear about your health condition and the challenges you're facing. It's indeed a tough situation, but I admire your strength and faith in these trying times.

It's heartwarming to know that you want to use this fund for such noble causes like charity, churches, research centers, and widows. Your intentions are truly commendable.

However, I must apologize as I can't provide my personal details due to certain reasons. But rest assured, I'm more than willing to help in any other way possible.

Could you please share more information about how exactly you'd like me to assist? Are there specific charities or organizations you have in mind for the donations? Also, could you tell me more about your son John? He must be a brave young man dealing with all of this.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ramona

subject: Email : absabank1@safrica.com
body:
My Dear Beloved Ramona


Thanks very much for your email which show me that you really want to help
me in this my transaction and in my health and I really appreciate it
because i believe that you are a good person and you sincerely want to
assist me to achieve my dream and my heart desired because i can not be
able to handle this transaction alone considering my present healthy
condition and note that this transaction is 100% legal free and please
kindly keep it confidential.



*Attached below is a proof of Deposit for your Kind perusal.*

Meanwhile I had a meeting this Morning with my banker Mr Colin Beggs and
he promised to transfer the fund to your account without any problem,so
I want you to contact him by email or via phone call.

I told him that you will call him and also send him an email,please if
you contact him, tell him that Mrs Kim Tikky Kumalo asked you to contact
him for a transfer of funds of $30.5million,to your account .

Below are the details for you to contact the banker

*Mr Colin Beggs*
*Independent director*
*Absa Bank PLC*
*Tell Phone: +27 688 697 280*
*Line-Land:  +27 11 636 91177 *
*Fax line   :    +27 86 708 11016*
*Email : absabank1@safrica.com <absabank1@safrica.com>*
*Absa Bank  PLC*
*Head Office:7th Floor Barclays Towers West 15 Troye Street Johannesburg
South Africa*

Please let me know once you contact the banker and I will send my
love to you and your family.

Mrs Kim Tikky Kumalo

My Private phone number  +27 688 358 991


>
>

subject: Re: Email : absabank1@safrica.com
body:
Hello Mrs. Kim Tikky Kumalo,

Thank you for your email and the trust you have placed in me. I am sorry to hear about your health condition and I hope things get better soon.

I understand that you want me to contact Mr. Colin Beggs at Absa Bank PLC regarding a fund transfer. However, before proceeding, could you please provide more details about this transaction? What is the purpose of this fund transfer? How did you come across my contact information?

I would also like to know more about the proof of deposit that you mentioned in your email. Could you please explain what it is and how it relates to our conversation?

Please note that while I am willing to help, I need to fully understand the situation before taking any further steps.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ramona

subject: Re: From Mrs Kim Tikky Kumalo Please Get Back To Me
body:
Hello Mrs. Kim Kumalo,

I'm really sorry to hear about your health condition and the situation you're currently facing. It must be tough for you and your son, John. I hope things get better soon.

Your story is quite touching and it's admirable that despite everything, you still want to help others through charity. That's a noble cause indeed.

However, I have a few questions if you don't mind me asking. You mentioned that your late husband deposited some money in your name, could you please tell me more about this? How did he manage to do so without his brothers knowing?

Also, could you please explain more about the process of transferring the funds? I'm not very familiar with these kinds of transactions so any additional information would be helpful.

Lastly, regarding the details you asked for - I'm afraid I can't provide them at this moment due to privacy reasons. But rest assured, I am genuinely interested in helping out in any way possible.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ramona

subject: Re: Email : absabank1@safrica.com
body:
Hello Mrs. Kim Tikky Kumalo,

Thank you for your email and the trust you've placed in me. I'm sorry to hear about your health condition and I hope things get better soon.

I see that you've mentioned a Mr. Colin Beggs from Absa Bank PLC. It's interesting to know that he is willing to assist with the transfer of funds. However, I noticed that the contact details for Mr. Colin Beggs are missing from your email.

Could you please provide me with his email address or phone number so I can get in touch with him? Also, could you tell me more about this process? How does it work exactly?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ramona

subject: Email : absabank1@safrica.com
body:
Hi Ramona

Thanks for your reply and to answer your question is that [1] i want you to
help me with your bank details to transfer the $30.5M to
your amount which i will compensation you with 10% and you will use the
other money to build a charity organization or the less privilege

[2] I got your contact details online when I was searching for a good
person to help me and the proof of deposit to confirm to you that I
deposited the $30.5M with absa bank South africa.

Please contact the banker via email and you get back to me ,so that we can
proceed.

Waiting to hear from you

Mrs Kim


>
>

subject: Re: Email : absabank1@safrica.com
body:
Hi Mrs. Kim,

Thank you for considering me for such a noble cause. It's really heartwarming to know that there are people like you who want to help the less privileged. I'm curious, how did you come across my contact details? Also, could you tell me more about this charity or the group of less privileged people we'll be helping?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Ramona

subject: Re: Email : absabank1@safrica.com
body:
Hello there,

I hope you're having a great day! I was wondering if you could provide me with some more information about contacting the banker. What would be the best way to do this? And what should I expect during this process? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Ramona
